function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Calibration errors due to imprecise sensor","Impact":"Inaccurate measurement of air quality could lead to improper actions","Mitigation":"Replace imprecise sensor with a more accurate one","Technologies":"High-precision CO2 sensors","People":"Facility managers, environmental health and safety officers","Owner":"Facility management team"},{"Description":"High eCO2 levels in indoor environment","Impact":"Poor indoor air quality leading to health issues and discomfort","Mitigation":"Introduce auxiliary ventilation systems, open windows, and manage emission sources","Technologies":"Auxiliary ventilation systems, air purifiers","People":"Students, staff, occupants","Owner":"Facility management team, building owners"},{"Description":"Inadequate temperature and ventilation control in winter and summer","Impact":"Uncomfortable indoor conditions and potential health risks","Mitigation":"Proper management of heating systems and ventilation, installation of air conditioning and purifiers if necessary","Technologies":"HVAC systems, air purifiers, smart thermostats","People":"Students, staff, occupants","Owner":"Facility management team, building owners"}]}
